body: wife goes to get her/or her husbands manga reviewed finds out about a scandal he supposdly had and editor offers to get him a spot in the mag or something she declines says she's her life is fine as is. Back at her place her husband reveals that his brother took money from their bank acct (he used a shitty pw/pin) and never bothered checking it and just realized. She ends up taking the guys offer and has sex with the guy and he texts saying he got a job at company or something along those lines and she wonders if what she did was the right thing (idk if i cus what she did was a waste of time as he did it himself or regret but it looks like it was same day and i'd doubt that editor could help that fast).Ijust remember seeing a summary of this before a while ago so i just went off memory
